bibl.bibl: Placzek, Baruch. 1878. Die Agada und der Darwinismus / Der Darwinismus in der Agada.Jüdische Literaturblatt, 1 January 1878, pp. 1–2; 6 February 1878, pp. 21–2; 13 February 1878, pp. 29–30; 20 February 1878, pp. 34–5; 27 February 1878, pp. 41–2; 13 March 1878, pp. 49–50; 17 April 1878, pp. 62–3; 5 June 1878, pp. 89–90; 12 June 1878, pp. 93–4; 19 June 1878, pp. 97–8; 26 June 1878, pp. 101–2; 3 July 1878, pp. 105–6; 10 July 1878, pp. 109–10; 17 July 1878, pp. 113–14; 24 July 1878, pp. 117–18; 31 July 1878, pp. 121–2.
bibl.idno: DAR 226.2: 5–20 (image 484ff. on Darwin online (browse): it is not included in the itemised list). The April date was supplied by the Rylands Library, Univ. Manchester, who have a run of JL. SE 15 March 2017.
